Package orders

Class Order

java.lang.Object
orders.Order
public class Order extends Object
This class is a order information class, to save the order information and uses other helper classes and connects between classes to get and set information in case its needed
Author:
Mahran

  • Method Details

    • setCartProduct

      public static void setCartProduct(String productName, String productID, String productPrice, String quantity, String maxquantity, javafx.scene.Node node, ProductCellController controller, String location, String area)
      Static Method to create an new product and set all the given data with the product cell controller
      Parameters:
      productName - product name
      productID - product id
      productPrice - product price
      quantity - product quantity
      maxquantity - product maximum quantity
      node - product node(FXML)
      controller - product cell Controller
      location - product location
      area - product area

    • setCartProduct2

      public static void setCartProduct2(String productName, String productID, String productPrice, String quantity, String maxquantity, javafx.scene.Node node, String location, String area)
      Static Method to create an new product and set all the given data without the product cell controller
      Parameters:
      productName - product name
      productID - product id
      productPrice - product price
      quantity - product quantity
      maxquantity - product maximum quantity
      node - product node(FXML)
      location - product location
      area - product area

    • removeCartProduct

      public static void removeCartProduct(String productName)
      Static Method to remove product with the productName(parameter) from products array
      Parameters:
      productName - the product name

    • updateProductQuantity

      public static void updateProductQuantity(String productName, String Quantity)
      Static Method to search for specific product with the productName(parameter) in the product array and change/update his quantity with the Quantity(parameter)
      Parameters:
      productName - the product name
      Quantity - the product quantity

    • checkProductInArray

      public static boolean checkProductInArray(String productName, String area, String location)
      Static Method to check if the products array contains that product (productName)
      Parameters:
      productName - the product name
      area - the current area
      location - the current location
      Returns:
      True if contains that product (productName) else false

    • setDelivery

      public static void setDelivery(String firstName, String lastName, String phoneNumber, String houseNumber, String street)
      Static Method to set the delivery information of the order
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of the customer
      lastName - last name of the customer
      phoneNumber - phone number of the customer
      houseNumber - house number of the customer
      street - street address of the customer

    • checkNotCompleteOrderInDB

      public static Integer checkNotCompleteOrderInDB()
      Method to check not complete order in data base in case there is the method returns true in case there isn't the method returns false
      Returns:
      returns true/false
